channel.title: [Matrix 718] Need help fixing run error
channel.description:
Kay so i finally found the lib file not included in Dragonkk's post and i fixed the client as well but for some reason ive completely forgotten how to write .bat files and i'm completely lost i used to program about 4 years ago and i'm trying to get back into it...but yeah this is my run.bat code at the moment..
[code]@echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause[/code]
Here's the error
[code]Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Prog Please install or use the JRE or JDK th Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I have the most recent Jdk and Jre. Ive already tried running directly to the JDK and or JRE directory's as showed below
[code]@echo off @title RUN MATRIX "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause[/code]
And i get the same error....
Anyways if someone could please help me id appreciate it very much :)

item.title: [Matrix 718] Need help fixing run error
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

@Above

Looks like you guys are missing the cache for the server.

Read full topic

Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

item.title: [Matrix 718] Need help fixing run error
item.dc:creator: @nervo nervo
item.description:
@nervo wrote:

try this code
@echo off
title Probana’s matrix runner
echo starting…
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.7.0_05/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

Read full topic
